Content: Some needs may be statisfied indirectly via buildings (e.g. the food
need is statisfied by restaurants that have to be supplied with grain
or robots need recharging stations). The consumption of this buildings
should depend on the number of pops. (So they would have an upper
limit, but if they could supply more pops than living in the colony
they would reduce their ressource consumption. Since different species
consume differen foods a food types should be introduced for this
system or the building would only support a certain kind of species.
